name: Rise of Jericho (itch)
description:
Jericho is one of the oldest inhabited cities in the world. Hunter-gatherers would settle here even before the beginnings of agriculture. Sadly, their story is filled with invasions and attacks from people who thought that "the land belonged to them."

Organize your population and resources to develop the city from its roots and keep it safe from invaders.

Food
Everybody needs to eat

 

Mud Bricks
Used for early buildings, anyone can make them from the ground

Stone
Fabricate tools with stone

You can save the game with S
